name: get_tile
example_comment: The above snippet returns a handle to the <%=tile%> directly in front of the <%=doc_class_name%>.
description: Returns a handle to the <%=tile%> offset in one direction from this <%=doc_class_name%>.
If this offset goes out of the bounds of the battlefield, or is to an otherwise invalid <%=tile%>, it returns `nil` instead.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.desc: The <%=direction%> you want to get select from.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.desc: The number of spaces in that direction you want to select a <%=tile%> at.
